attributes.action: Stop government members making ill informed decisions. We don't want world war 3
attributes.background: We, the people do not want Michael Fallon/ David Cameron etc making ill informed decisions on our behalf that highly jeopardise the safety and future of our children and of us. We do not want World War 3! We do not want to go to war with Russia. We say NO to military intervention in the Balkans!!!!

rejection.details:
It is clear that you are opposed to military intervention in the Balkans. But it is not clear whether your petition is against all military action, or only in specific cases.

It is also clear that you are concerned about the information available to the Prime Minsiter and the Secretary of State for Defence, but not clear what you would like to change.

If your petition could be more specific, we would look at it again/
